option.od: print the help message and exit.
filename of the electric field data. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a electric field data.

description.p: Creates an index of eletric field data.
The index is written to standard output.

example.description: Create an index file for the electric field data file "20040830.efield". The index is writen to the file "20040830.efieldinx".
